Friday Khutbah: The Importance of Gratitude

📅 12:30 PM📍 Main Prayer Hall
Religious

Join us for this week's Friday sermon focusing on the concept of gratitude in Islam and how it transforms our daily lives.

Sultanpur Al-Falah Islamic Center

A place of worship, community, and spiritual growth serving the Muslim community in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

Established 1995 • Serving the Ummah for over 25 years
